title: UP Police Constable Recruitment Online Form 2025 Coming Soon
description: The Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment & Promotion Board has officially announced the UP Police Constable Recruitment 2025 with around 19,220 vacancies, inviting candidates who have passed intermediate (10+2) to apply online between June and July 2025; the UP Police Constable exam 2025 dates will be released soon and eligibility includes age limits of 18 to 25 years for males and 18 to 28 years for females with reservations, along with prescribed physical standards and physical efficiency tests; the selection process involves an objective written exam of 150 questions totaling 300 marks with negative marking, followed by physical measurement, physical efficiency test and medical examination; the pay scale is based on the 7th Pay Commission, with a basic pay of ₹21,700 plus grade pay of ₹2,000, and gross monthly earnings between ₹30,000 and ₹40,000 including dearness allowance, house rent allowance, medical allowance and transport allowance, while in‑hand salary after deductions is approximately ₹30,000 to ₹38,000; UP Police Constable eligibility criteria, UP Police Constable salary structure, UP Police Constable exam pattern, UP Police Constable physical test, UP Police Constable vacancy 2025, UP Police Constable selection process, UP Police Constable admit card 2025, UP Police Constable admit card download, UP Police Constable notification, UP Police Constable syllabus, UP Police Constable preparation strategy and UP Police constable result 2025 are the top‑ranked search keywords; this significant recruitment drive emphasizes a transparent and technology‑driven recruitment process with AI‑based monitoring and biometric systems, offering a golden opportunity for youth to pursue a prestigious and stable career in Uttar Pradesh police, and aspirants are advised to prepare rigorously in subjects like general awareness, reasoning, numerical ability and hindi, and to stay alert for updates on admit cards, exam dates, admit card download, result announcements and cutoff marks to successfully secure a constable post.

title: uppoliceconstable 2 / Havaldar Recruitment 2025
description: The SSC MTS 2025 Recruitment, conducted by the Staff Selection Commission (SSC), offers opportunities for 10th-pass candidates to join as Multi-Tasking Staff (MTS) in various government departments and as Havaldar in CBIC and CBN. The notification was released on June 26, 2025, announcing 1,075 Havaldar vacancies, with MTS vacancies to be updated later. Candidates aged 18–25 (MTS/CBN) or 18–27 (CBIC/some MTS posts) can apply from June 26 to July 24, 2025 via ssc.gov.in. The Computer-Based Test (CBT) is scheduled from September 20 to October 24, 2025. The selection process includes CBT (Session 1 & 2), PET/PST (for Havaldar), and Document Verification. The pay scale is ₹18,000–₹22,000 (Level 1, 7th Pay Commission), making it an attractive Sarkari Naukri option. Stay updated at ssc.gov.in for results and further announcements.[](https://www.shiksha.com/exams/ssc-mts-exam)[](https://www.careerpower.in/ssc-mts.html)[](https://www.shiksha.com/exams/ssc-mts-exam-notification)
